################################
######  技術交換用イベント #######
################################
namespace = ngm_tech_trade

# 研究取引 贈与 国選び
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.1
	title = ngm_tech_trade.1.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.1.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
		save_global_event_target_as = ngm_technology_trade_0
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				has_communications = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
				is_country_type = default
			}
			save_global_event_target_as = ngm_technology_trade_1
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					has_communications = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
					is_country_type = default
					NOT = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
				}
				save_global_event_target_as = ngm_technology_trade_2
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						has_communications = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
						is_country_type = default
						NOT = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
						}
						NOT = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
						}
					}
					save_global_event_target_as = ngm_technology_trade_3
					random_country = {
						limit = {
							has_communications = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
							is_country_type = default
							NOT = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
							}
							NOT = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
							}
							NOT = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_3
							}
						}
						save_global_event_target_as = ngm_technology_trade_4
						random_country = {
							limit = {
								has_communications = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
								is_country_type = default
								NOT = {
									is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1

								NOT = {
									is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
								}
								NOT = {
									is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_3
								}
								NOT = {
									is_same_value = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_4
								}
							}
							save_global_event_target_as = ngm_technology_trade_5

									limit = {

							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.a
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
		}
		allow = {
			NOR = {
				is_rival = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
				is_at_war_with = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.2
			}
			set_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.b
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
		}
		allow = {
			NOR = {
				is_rival = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
				is_at_war_with = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.2
			}
			set_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.c
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_3
		}
		allow = {

	}

	# 国選択リセット
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.1
			}
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}
	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.o
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}
}

# 研究取引 贈与 分野振り分け
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.2
	title = ngm_tech_trade.2.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.2.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# 物理学tier1
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.a
		trigger = {
			can_research_tier = {
				area = physics
				tier = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.10
			}
		}
	}
	# 物理学tier2
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.b
		trigger = {
			can_research_tier = {
				area = physics
				tier = 2
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.11
			}
		}
	}
	# 物理学tier3
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.c
		trigger = {
			can_research_tier = {
				area = physics
				tier = 3
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.12
			}
		}
	}
	# 物理学tier4
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.d
		trigger = {
			can_research_tier = {
				area = physics
				tier = 4
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.13
			}
		}
	}
	# 物理学tier5
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.e
		trigger = {
			can_research_tier = {
				area = physics
				tier = 5
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.14
			}
		}
	}
	# 社会学tier1
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.f
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.15
			}
		}
	}
	# 社会学tier2
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.g
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.16
			}
		}
	}
	# 社会学tier3
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.h
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.17
			}
		}
	}
	# 社会学tier4
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.i
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.18
			}
		}
	}
	# 社会学tier5
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.j
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.19
			}
		}
	}
	# 工学tier1
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.k
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.20
			}
		}
	}
	# 工学tier2
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.l
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.21
			}
		}
	}
	# 工学tier3
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.m
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.22
			}
		}
	}
	# 工学tier4
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.n
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.23
			}
		}
	}
	# 工学tier5
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.o
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.24
			}
		}
	}
	# # 他の追加用mod
	# option = {
	# 	name = ngm_tech_trade.2.o
	# 	hidden_effect = {
	# 		country_event = {
	# 			id = ngm_tech_trade.3
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# }
	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}
}

# physics
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.10
	title = ngm_tech_trade.10.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.10.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_administrative_ai
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.10.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_administrative_ai
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_3
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_4_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_4
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_5_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_5
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_6_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_6
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_7_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_7
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_8_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_8
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_9_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_9
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_10_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_10
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_11_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_11
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_12_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_12
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_13_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_13
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_12
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_13_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_13
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	# 戻る
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.p
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.2
			}
		}
	}
	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.11
	title = ngm_tech_trade.11.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.11.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_assisted_detection
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.11.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_assisted_detection
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}

	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.12
	title = ngm_tech_trade.12.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.12.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_antimatter_power
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.12.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_antimatter_power
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag

	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.13
	title = ngm_tech_trade.13.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.13.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_arc_emitter_1
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.13.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_arc_emitter_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag

			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag

			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2

			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9

	id = ngm_tech_trade.14

					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_3

			else_if = {

	# 戻る
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.p
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.2
			}
		}
	}
	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}
}

# society
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.15
	title = ngm_tech_trade.15.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.15.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_adaptive_bureaucracy
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.15.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_adaptive_bureaucracy
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}

					}

			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag

			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2

			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9

	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11

	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2

country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.18
	title = ngm_tech_trade.18.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.18.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_capital_productivity_3
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.18.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_capital_productivity_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {

	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13

		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2

			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5

			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11

# engineering
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.20
	title = ngm_tech_trade.20.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.20.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_afterburners_1
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.20.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_afterburners_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {

				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag

				random_country = {
					limit = {

	# 戻る
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.p
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.2
			}
		}
	}
	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.21
	title = ngm_tech_trade.21.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.21.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_advanced_metallurgy_1
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.21.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_advanced_metallurgy_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag

		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n

			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag

			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1

country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.22
	title = ngm_tech_trade.22.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.22.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_afterburners_2
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.22.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_afterburners_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag

	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.23
	title = ngm_tech_trade.23.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.23.desc

	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_advanced_metallurgy_2
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.23.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_advanced_metallurgy_2
		}

			if = {

			has_technology = tech_robomodding_points_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_2
					}

				}

						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_4

	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11

country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.24
	title = ngm_tech_trade.24.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.24.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_armor_hardeners_2
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.24.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_armor_hardeners_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag

					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_13_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_13
					}
					country_event = {
						id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}

	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.2.p
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = ngm_tech_trade.2
			}
		}
	}
	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}
}

# 研究取引 贈与 受け取り側
country_event = {
  id = ngm_tech_trade.1001
  title = ngm_tech_trade.1001.name
  desc = ngm_tech_trade.1001.desc
  picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
  show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
  is_triggered_only = yes  option = {
    name = ngm_tech_trade.1001.c
    trigger = {
      has_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_arcane_deciphering_global_flag
    }
    allow = {
      NOT = {
        has_technology = tech_arcane_deciphering
      }
      resource_stockpile_compare = {
        resource = influence
        value >= 50
      }
    }
    add_resource = {
      influence = -50
    }
    give_technology = {
      tech = tech_arcane_deciphering
    }
    hidden_effect = {
      remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_arcane_deciphering_global_flag
      random_country = {
        limit = {
          is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
        }
        country_event = {
          id = ngm_tech_trade.1002
        }
      }
      add_trust = {
        who = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
        amount = 50
      }
    }
  }
  option = {
    name = ngm_tech_trade.1001.c
    trigger = {
      has_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_archaeo_pk_devolving_beam_global_flag
    }
    allow = {
      NOT = {
        has_technology = tech_archaeo_pk_devolving_beam
      }
      resource_stockpile_compare = {
        resource = influence
        value >= 50
      }
    }
    add_resource = {
      influence = -50
    }
    give_technology = {
      tech = tech_archaeo_pk_devolving_beam
    }
    hidden_effect = {
      remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_archaeo_pk_devolving_beam_global_flag
      random_country = {
        limit = {
          is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
        }
        country_event = {
          id = ngm_tech_trade.1002
        }
      }
      add_trust = {
        who = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
        amount = 50
      }
    }
  }

      has_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_space_mining_5_global_flag
    }
    allow = {
      NOT = {
        has_technology = tech_space_mining_5
      }
      resource_stockpile_compare = {
        resource = influence
        value >= 50
      }
    }
    add_resource = {
      influence = -50
    }
    give_technology = {
      tech = tech_space_mining_5
    }
    hidden_effect = {
      remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_space_mining_5_global_flag
      random_country = {
        limit = {
          is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
        }
        country_event = {
          id = ngm_tech_trade.1002
        }
      }
      add_trust = {
        who = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
        amount = 50
      }
    }
  }

      has_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_energy_torpedoes_1_global_flag
    }
    allow = {
      NOT = {
        has_technology = tech_energy_torpedoes_1
      }
      resource_stockpile_compare = {
        resource = influence
        value >= 50
      }
    }
    add_resource = {
      influence = -50
    }
    give_technology = {
      tech = tech_energy_torpedoes_1
    }
    hidden_effect = {
      remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_tech_energy_torpedoes_1_global_flag
      random_country = {
        limit = {
          is_same_empire = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
        }
        country_event = {
          id = ngm_tech_trade.1002
        }
      }
      add_trust = {
        who = event_target:ngm_technology_trade_0
        amount = 50
      }
    }
  }

# 研究取引 贈与 受理
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.1002
	title = ngm_tech_trade.1002.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.1002.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1002.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_4_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_4_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_5_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_5_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_6_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_6_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_7_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_7_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_8_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_8_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_8_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_8_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_9_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_9_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_10_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_10_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_11_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_11_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_12_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_12_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_13_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_13_country_flag
			}
			remove_global_flag = ngm_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = ngm_technology_trade_13
		}
	}
}

# 研究取引 贈与 拒否
country_event = {
	id = ngm_tech_trade.1003
	title = ngm_tech_trade.1003.name
	desc = ngm_tech_trade.1003.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = ngm_tech_trade.1003.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_1_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				remove_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_2_country_flag
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_3_country_flag

					has_country_flag = ngm_technology_trade_4_country_flag
